exponent.translation[0].definitions[0].d: an exponent of an idea, belief etc tries to explain it and persuade others that it is good or useful
exponent.translation[0].definitions[0].e: a leading exponent of desktop publishing
exponent.translation[0].definitions[1].d: an exponent of a particular skill, idea, or activity is someone who is good at it
exponent.translation[0].definitions[1].e: The most famous exponent of this approach to art was probably Charles Rennie Mackintosh.
exponent.translation[0].definitions[2].d: a sign written above and to the right of a number or letter to show how many times that quantity is to be multiplied by itself
